message.body: Is it a double pony? And do you want to google+ with mom and me?
It is a double pony and hang on
Bought a 32DDD bra from Victorias secret. Its like boob magic
Yeah. Remember that cup sizes are proportional to band size though, not absolute
My left boob was spilling a little out of my 36Cs so I used a very exacting bra measurement website and it suggested 30G but those are. . .hard to find
Lol. I just can't imagine wearing a 30 band size. I can't even wear a 34
I actually think the 32 is right
30 would be too small. But I almost fell out of my chair when it suggested 30G
